Title: Love And Marriage
Plot: Masters and Johnson decide that the best way to record their study findings is to film them, but to do so they have to enlist outside help. Johnson redoubles her efforts to get a college degree, only to find that Dr. DePaul?s Basic Anatomy class is a requirement. Meanwhile, Haas and Langham ? both unsure in their relationships ? convince each other of the merits of being a married man.
